column5: My group and I will be flying out of Nakina in a couple of weeks and thought it would be a good idea to appeal to the wisdom of the group and see if anyone has fished Kapikotongwa Lake. If you have any suggested waypoints you can share or suggestions on typical hotspots I would greatly appreciate the advice. Thanks and tight lines everyone!
What week are you Going? Our group will be next door on melchett in August, hoping the water is high enough this year so we can go on tour and see your camp!
We will be there Aug 5-12. Never been there before so I am unfamiliar with the water levels. I hear they have been high so far this season
